channel.title: Temecula Valley Math Circle
channel.description: Recent content on Temecula Valley Math Circle

item.title: About
item.description: Mission Statment While centered in the Temecula Valley, the Temecula Valley Math Circle (TVMC) is designed to centralize and enhance all competitive math programs throughout the Inland Empire.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact us at tvmathcircle@gmail.com. Subscribe below to get emailed announcement and meeting reminders. #mc_embed_signup{background:#fff; clear:left; font:14px Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; width:100%;} Subscribe

item.title: Resources
item.description: Practice Problems Art of Problem Solving Archive Problem Solving Through Problems, by Loren Larson Solving Mathematical Problems, by Terence Tao Problem Solving Strategies, by Arthur Engel Putnam and Beyond, by Gelca & Andreescu Competitions American Mathematics Competition: AMC 8/10/12 are 90 min.
